name: Day at the Races (itch)
description:
You are the proud owner of a lean mean speed machine, your pet corgi. Recently you have entered in this year's corgi racing competition! Start your engines and race through to the finish line by acquiring special toys to slow down your opponents and boost yourself to the finish line before they reach it first!

Key Features
  • 8 player online corgi racing fun!
  • Collect items around the map to gain the advantage over other racers.
  • Enjoy cute and colorful art.
How to Play Online

To play Day at the Races you must join a multiplayer session on a dedicated server. Currently you have two main options for joining a game session:

  • Join our official server: 71.44.212.52 Port 9099 or 10.200.208.190
  • Join a server hosted by a community member.
How to Play Offline

To play offline against the AI you must download the server executable, launch it, and connect to the ip address: 127.0.0.1

How to Host Your Own Server

To host a community server you must download the server executable. On the network of the device you must port forward the port 9099. If you would like to change which port the game runs on launch the server executable with the following command:

-port {port number}
